channel.title: docs on UNICEF O.S. Inventory
channel.description: Recent content in docs on UNICEF O.S. Inventory

item.title: Maintainer's guide for O.S. Inventory
item.description: This document is a maintainerâ€™s guide for the UNICEF Open Source Inventory. Yes, this very site! This guide covers key information and helpful resources, as well as best practices when maintaining the O.S. Inventory. Contribution conventions This section explains contribution conventions for the Open Source Inventory. These are common conventions that all contributors are asked to make when contributing to this repository. Please make a best effort to follow these conventions at all times, unless there is a justified reason to break convention.

item.title: Modules
item.description: The UNICEF Open Source Mentorship programme offers multiple learning modules and mentorship topics. This page provides an overview of the different modules currently offered through the Open Source Mentorship programme. Offered modules Legal & Licensing: Foundations of Open Source intellectual property Launching your Open Source project Open Source documentation Continuous Integration for continuous contribution Archetypes: Shape and size of Open Source over time
